name: node-project-zangetsu
description: Zangetsu is an innovative trading bot designed to streamline cryptocurrency trading. Powered by Node.js and integrated with the Binance API, Zangetsu offers real-time market insights, automated trading strategies, and data-driven decision-making. Join us in the world of crypto trading with cutting-edge technology.
author: David Almeida davyd.aguiar@hotmail.com
